entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 40%

entry.title: Tuesday night: Flurries. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Flurries beginning this evening then changing to 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Tuesday 27 December 2022
